name: One Left (Gamesalive)
description:
Add and subtract numbers to get to 1 point within 10 moves.

Use WASD to move the green square between spaces. You cannot move into the orange space. 

Normal Mode: You have 60 seconds to use up your 10 moves and finish with a score of 1.

Hard mode: You have 60 seconds to use up your 10 moves and finish in the red centre square.

Enjoy!
